attributes.action: Scrap 15 Million Pound Thatcher Library & Give Money To NHS
attributes.additional_details:
We urge the government to scrap the 15 million pound spend on a Library & Memorial for Margaret Thatcher and put the money to better use. Donate the money to the NHS or another worthy Charity


David Cameron has given his backing to the £15million museum and library which is planned as a permanent memorial to Margaret Thatcher.

Copy & Paste the link below to read the full story.


http://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/politics/margaret-thatcher/10007828/David-Cameron-gives-backing-to-15million-Thatcher-museum.html

rejection.details: No taxpayers money is being used for this library.
